did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Workers United Memorabilia, 2009-2009
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Hotel Employees & Restaurant Employees International Union
Union of Needletrades, Industrial and Textile Employees

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Workers United Memorabilia #6284 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p:
Related Collections:
6284: Workers United Records
6284 AV: Workers United Audiovisual Materials
6284 G: Workers United Posters
6284 P: Workers United Photographs
6284 PUBS: Workers United Publications
6284(d): Workers United Records (digital)

Assorted Awards

scopecontent.p: Metro New York, Labor Communications Council First Award ; Second Award ; Third Award ; International Labor communications Association Third Award ; Honorable Mention ; Second Award

did.unittitle: Assorted information cards

scopecontent.p: Save the date card for Centennial Commemoration Workers United/SEIU ; Triangle Fire Memorial and Historical Association ; Triangle Fire Memorial Design Competition ; We Shall Never Forget Remember the Triangle Fire ; When women pursue Justice: an exhibition ; Cake (Collecting Action and Knowledge about the Everyday) ; Women of hope ; Birds on fire ; The New York City Triangle Factor Fire

did.unittitle: Assorted advertisement material

scopecontent.p: UNITE Local 23-25 (mini calendar) ; key chain type cards (stiff paper, look like flags) UNITE! Proudly Made in New York ; UNITE HERE! Single card calendars (2005-2006) ; Calendar from American Society of Safety Engineers 'Celebrating 100 Years of Safety'

did.unittitle: Sewing kits
Workers United paperweight - Founder's Award - December 6, 2013, Chinatown YMCA

scopecontent.p: clear with a hand drawn and colored picture inside

did.unittitle: Baseball cap - 1911 Triangle Shirtwaist Factory Fire 2011

scopecontent.p: black cap with gold and red lettering

did.unittitle: Sash - Red with gold lettering in both English and Chinese Character - TO: Local 23-25 100 Years Anniversary (opposite end) FROM: Local 23-25 UNITE Retirees
Sash (two of them) - Red with gold lettering, both English and Chinese Characters - TO: Local 23-25 100 Years Anniversary ; FROM: C.L.U.W. Chinese Committee
Sash - Red with gold lettering - all in Chinese Characters
UNITE, ILGWU Memorabilia

scopecontent.p: ILGWU keychain ; UNITE! Pins (24) ; UNITE! Activist Pin ; ILGWU Pin (bedazzled with white stones) ; I am a proud member of the Workers United Retirees Association Pin (8)

did.unittitle: Poster - "Over decades, workers in the garment industry have fashioned a way of life through their union. Their story is a chapter in mankind's long struggle for human dignity.
Vinyl banner - White with red and black lettering -- AB Amalgamated Bank (47"x47")
T-shirt - Black with yellow lettering -- Front: ? / Back: GOTTA CLUW?
T-shirt - White with black and red lettering - Front: CLUW / Back: We didn't come here to swap recipes:not Then-1974; not Now-1999
T-shirt - White with blue and peach design - Front: Women Labor's Future - Coalition of Labor Union Women / Back: [blank]
T-shirt - Black with purple and red design - Front: Vision Voices Votes / Back: [blank]
T-shirt - Black with white and black lettering - Front: UNITE FIGHT / Back: ILGWU
T-shirt - White with a large union label - Front: Made in U.S.A. - International Ladies' Garment Workers Union / Back: ILGWU
T-shirt - White with blue and red lettering - Front: UNITE! Against Sweatshops / Back: www.uniteunion.org
T-shirt - White with blue and red lettering - Front: UNITE! Against Sweatshops / Back: www.uniteunion.org
T-shirt - Red with black and red lettering - Front: UNITE HERE!
T-shirt - Red with black and red lettering - picture of President Obama - Front: UNTIE HERE! For OBAMA
UNITE! Pins and ribbons [ribbons are white with blue and red lettering UNITE!] (6 pieces)
Swatches of brightly colored union label cloth
Shopping bags - plastic, advertising UNITE (4 pieces)
Book cover - 'Famous Dates in History"; "Weights and Measures"
ILGWU folders, 3 two pocket folders, bright yellow with a Union Label on the front
Triangle Shirtwaist Factory Fire - Key chains (3 pieces)
Post cards - Triangle Fire - (4 pieces)
ILGWU - sewing kit; ruler
Recognition Certificate - from Workers United Education Program
Pins - (3) - We Are All Workers; (1) - Savethegarmentcenter.com; (1) - Political Activist UNITE!
